JSON is a plague AND I'M USING IT EVERYWHERE!!! X3

I think that is self explenatory. Where 'ELEMENT' is you type what html element you want. Instead of 'String' you type the text you want!
Currently (yes, I plan to expand this REALLY BAD syntax) there are only two exceptions. Img and a.

All images on the interweb SHOULD have an alt, we don't want our blind friends feeling left out! So, I added the option to add one. At this time, it's hoping that there isn't an exclamation mark in the src... LOL
Again, betting on there not being an exclamation mark in the link... I KNOW I HAVE TO MAKE IT BETTER!!!! BUT IT'S HARD OKAY!!!
Aside from that, the JavaScript is pretty standard, just some JSON manipulation.

IDK tbh, I may continue this syntax. I never saw someone making a note/blog DIRECTLY IN JSON XP, so it could be fun to develop this as my abilities grow. Who knows! (I will probably just switch it for markdown HEH) Was it fun though? Yes!
I am aware of how ugly the blog looks atm, no need to rub it in my face... I will gradually work on it and improve it.
